title: Shaft Diameter Out of Spec
creator: John Smith
description: Shaft diameter measured 15.12mm exceeds maximum specification of 15.05mm
initial_analysis: Supplier tooling appears to be out of calibration based on consistent positive deviation
cause_of_ncr: Supplier CNC lathe calibration drift detected during audit
reason_closure: Supplier recalibrated equipment and submitted conforming samples. Verification completed.

title: Undersized Bolt Dimensions
creator: Bob Wilson
description: M8 bolts measuring 7.85mm are below minimum specification of 7.95mm
initial_analysis: Raw material appears undersized. Batch traceability indicates material lot #MT-8821
cause_of_ncr: Supplier used incorrect raw material stock diameter
reason_closure: Supplier identified root cause as material selection error. New batch submitted and approved.

title: Bearing Housing Dimensional Issues
creator: Sarah Lee
description: Multiple bearing housings measured oversized at 25.12mm vs spec maximum of 25.05mm
initial_analysis: Pattern suggests systematic issue with supplier manufacturing process. Investigation ongoing.
cause_of_ncr: Root cause under investigation - suspected fixture wear

title: Spring Force Below Specification
creator: Tom Hardy
description: Spring compression force measured at 120.5N is significantly below minimum spec of 125.0N
initial_analysis: Heat treatment process parameters under review. Hardness testing shows values at lower end of acceptable range.
cause_of_ncr: Heat treatment furnace temperature profile deviation detected

title: Continued Housing Dimension Failures
creator: Mike Johnson
description: Additional bearing housing failures detected. Related to NCR-2024-003. Pattern continuing despite supplier corrective actions.
initial_analysis: Appears to be systemic supplier process control issue requiring comprehensive audit
cause_of_ncr: Linked to NCR-2024-003 - comprehensive root cause analysis in progress

title: Oversized Bolt Scrap Required
creator: Alice Brown
description: M8 bolts measuring 8.12mm exceed maximum specification of 8.05mm. Lot requires 100% scrap.
initial_analysis: Tool wear evident on supplier manufacturing equipment during containment inspection
cause_of_ncr: Worn cutting tool identified. Supplier tool change interval inadequate.
reason_closure: Supplier implemented improved tool wear monitoring and reduced change intervals. Process capability study completed.

title: Clutch Plate Friction Below Minimum
creator: Dr. Lisa Wang
description: Clutch plate friction coefficient measured at 97.2% is below minimum specification of 98.0%
initial_analysis: Material composition analysis shows variation in friction material density. Supplier process audit recommended.
cause_of_ncr: Material mixing process inconsistency suspected. Laboratory analysis ongoing.

title: Transit Packaging Damage
creator: Jane Doe
description: Gear assemblies received with packaging damage. Internal inspection shows no product damage.
initial_analysis: Packaging design inadequate for shipping vibration and handling
cause_of_ncr: Insufficient protective packaging for product weight and fragility
reason_closure: Supplier upgraded to reinforced packaging with additional foam cushioning. Trial shipment successful.

title: Systematic Supplier Quality Failure
creator: Sarah Lee
description: Persistent bearing housing quality issues across multiple lots. Supplier audit required to assess process capability and control.
initial_analysis: Multiple NCRs (003 and 005) indicate loss of process control. Systemic corrective action required.
cause_of_ncr: Supplier quality system breakdown - inadequate process monitoring and preventive maintenance
disposition: Comprehensive supplier audit scheduled 2024-02-15. All shipments on 100% inspection hold.

title: Surface Finish Inconsistency
creator: Tom Hardy
description: Washer surface finish shows visible variation in polish quality across batch
initial_analysis: Supplier polishing process lacks standardized parameters and acceptance criteria
cause_of_ncr: Inconsistent polishing technique and operator training
reason_closure: Supplier documented polishing procedures and conducted operator training. Process now stable.

title: Gasket Thickness Below Minimum
creator: Robert Chen
description: Gasket thickness measured at 1.94mm is below minimum specification of 1.95mm
initial_analysis: Material compression during manufacturing process under investigation. Fixture design review initiated.
cause_of_ncr: Manufacturing fixture inadequate - allows material compression

title: Missing Certificate of Conformance
creator: Jane Doe
description: Shipment received without required Certificate of Conformance documentation
initial_analysis: Administrative error - supplier shipping process breakdown
cause_of_ncr: Supplier shipping department failed to include required documentation
disposition: Documentation requested. Shipment on hold pending receipt.

title: Weld Porosity Detected
creator: Mike Johnson
description: Radiographic inspection reveals porosity in weld joint exceeding acceptance criteria
initial_analysis: Gas shielding inadequate during welding process. Flow rate verification needed.
cause_of_ncr: Welding gas flow rate below specification due to regulator malfunction
reason_closure: Regulator replaced and welding parameters verified. Operator retrained on gas system checks.

title: Hardness Test Failure
creator: Dr. Lisa Wang
description: Hardness readings at 42 HRC below minimum specification of 45 HRC
initial_analysis: Heat treatment cycle time or temperature suspected. Furnace calibration under review.
cause_of_ncr: Heat treatment furnace thermocouple calibration drift

title: Paint Coverage Insufficient
creator: Bob Wilson
description: Dry film thickness measured at 1.8 mils below minimum of 2.0 mils
initial_analysis: Spray gun air pressure low. Maintenance records show missed PM.
cause_of_ncr: Preventive maintenance schedule not followed - air system degradation
reason_closure: PM schedule corrected and air system serviced. Coverage now within spec.

title: Torque Specification Exceeded
creator: Sarah Lee
description: Fastener torque recorded at 145 ft-lbs exceeds maximum of 130 ft-lbs
initial_analysis: Torque wrench calibration questionable. Tool verification initiated.
disposition: All tools being recalibrated. Assembly on hold.

title: O-Ring Dimension Variance
creator: Alice Brown
description: O-ring inner diameter at 24.8mm below minimum of 25.0mm
initial_analysis: Supplier mold wear suspected based on dimensional pattern
reason_closure: Supplier replaced mold and submitted new samples. Dimensions verified.

title: Thread Gage Failure
creator: Tom Hardy
description: Internal threads fail GO gage inspection. NO gage passes indicating undersized threads.
initial_analysis: Thread cutting tool worn or feed rate incorrect
cause_of_ncr: Threading tap worn beyond tool life

title: Corrosion on Storage Parts
creator: Jane Doe
description: Surface corrosion detected on steel parts in storage
initial_analysis: Storage environment humidity control inadequate
cause_of_ncr: Warehouse HVAC system malfunction - high humidity
disposition: HVAC repair scheduled. Parts being evaluated for use.

title: Label Information Incorrect
creator: Robert Chen
description: Product labels show incorrect part number reference
initial_analysis: Label printing software database error
reason_closure: Database corrected and verification process added to shipping checklist.

title: Concentricity Out of Tolerance
creator: Mike Johnson
description: Shaft concentricity measured at 0.08mm TIR exceeds maximum of 0.05mm
initial_analysis: Machining setup or spindle runout issue
disposition: Lathe being rebuilt. Production moved to alternate machine.

title: Chemical Composition Variance
creator: Dr. Lisa Wang
description: Alloy analysis shows carbon content at 0.42% vs specification of 0.38-0.40%
initial_analysis: Supplier material certification under review
disposition: Material review board evaluating impact on properties

title: Incomplete Assembly
creator: Bob Wilson
description: Unit shipped with missing retaining ring
initial_analysis: Assembly work instruction incomplete - step omitted
reason_closure: Work instruction corrected and assembly team retrained. Verification checklist updated.

title: Vibration Test Failure
creator: Sarah Lee
description: Assembly failed vibration test at 2.5g - crack detected in bracket
initial_analysis: Bracket design inadequate for vibration environment

title: Leak Test Failure
creator: Alice Brown
description: Hydraulic fitting leaking at 2800 PSI below required 3000 PSI
initial_analysis: O-ring or fitting torque issue

title: Wrong Part Shipped
creator: Jane Doe
description: Customer received PN-65430 instead of ordered PN-65431
initial_analysis: Picking error - similar part numbers
reason_closure: Correct part shipped overnight. Pick verification process improved.

title: Electrical Resistance High
creator: Robert Chen
description: Contact resistance measured at 2.5 ohms vs maximum of 1.0 ohm
initial_analysis: Contact surface contamination or plating defect

title: Packaging Quantity Error
creator: Tom Hardy
description: Box labeled as 100 pcs contains only 97 pieces
initial_analysis: Counting scale calibration or process error
reason_closure: Scale recalibrated and count verification process enhanced.

title: Contamination in Hydraulic Fluid
creator: Dr. Lisa Wang
description: Particle count exceeds ISO 4406 cleanliness code 18/16/13
initial_analysis: Storage or handling contamination
disposition: Supplier tank cleaning and filtration required

title: Dimension Drift Over Time
creator: Mike Johnson
description: SPC charts show gradual dimensional drift approaching upper spec limit
initial_analysis: Tool wear progression

title: Brittle Fracture in Testing
creator: Sarah Lee
description: Sample fractured in tensile test at 85% of minimum required strength
initial_analysis: Heat treatment or material issue
disposition: All production lot quarantined pending investigation

title: Calibration Certificate Expired
creator: Bob Wilson
description: Measurement performed with gage having expired calibration
initial_analysis: Calibration tracking system failure
reason_closure: Gage recalibrated - still within tolerance. All measurements verified valid. Reminder system repaired.

title: Supplier Part Number Mismatch
creator: Alice Brown
description: Parts marked with supplier PN S-12345 vs our PN requirement of S-12346
initial_analysis: Cross-reference error or supplier shipping mistake

title: Adhesive Bond Failure
creator: Jane Doe
description: Adhesive bond failed shear test at 850 PSI vs minimum 1000 PSI
initial_analysis: Surface preparation or adhesive mix ratio issue

title: Laser Marking Illegible
creator: Tom Hardy
description: 2D data matrix code cannot be read by scanner
initial_analysis: Laser power degradation or focus drift
reason_closure: Laser power supply replaced. Mark quality verified.

title: Foreign Material Found
creator: Robert Chen
description: Metal chips found in sealed component cavity
initial_analysis: Machining debris not removed before sealing
disposition: Enhanced cleaning verification process being implemented

title: Plating Thickness Below Minimum
creator: Dr. Lisa Wang
description: Zinc plating measured at 0.00035 inches vs minimum 0.0005 inches
initial_analysis: Plating bath chemistry or time issue
disposition: Bath analysis and replenishment in progress

title: Software Version Mismatch
creator: Mike Johnson
description: Controller programmed with software v2.1 instead of required v2.3
initial_analysis: Revision control error
reason_closure: Units reprogrammed with correct version. Library management improved.

title: Pressure Relief Valve Setting Wrong
creator: Sarah Lee
description: Relief valve opens at 3200 PSI instead of specified 3000 PSI
initial_analysis: Valve adjustment or supplier calibration error
disposition: All units being retested. Supplier corrective action required.

title: Drawing Revision Not Updated
creator: Alice Brown
description: Parts manufactured to Rev B drawing when Rev C is current
initial_analysis: ECN distribution failure
cause_of_ncr: Engineering change notice not received by production
reason_closure: ECN distribution process corrected. Rev C parts acceptable per engineering review.

title: Heat Lot Traceability Missing
creator: Jane Doe
description: Heat lot number not recorded on traveler for critical material
initial_analysis: Documentation procedure not followed
disposition: Material testing to establish properties. May require part scrap.

title: Insulation Resistance Low
creator: Tom Hardy
description: Insulation resistance at 250 megohms vs minimum 500 megohms
initial_analysis: Moisture absorption or insulation damage
disposition: Parts being baked out and retested

title: Salt Spray Test Premature Failure
creator: Dr. Lisa Wang
description: Red rust at 72 hours vs requirement of 240 hours minimum
initial_analysis: Coating integrity or substrate preparation issue
disposition: Production stopped. Full process audit initiated.

title: Fastener Cross-Threading
creator: Robert Chen
description: Multiple instances of cross-threaded fasteners found during inspection
initial_analysis: Assembly technique or fixture alignment
reason_closure: Operator retrained. Fixture alignment verified. Inspection frequency increased.

title: Material Certificate Data Error
creator: Alice Brown
description: Material cert shows wrong heat number vs container label
initial_analysis: Supplier documentation error

title: Optical Inspection Reject Rate High
creator: Mike Johnson
description: Vision system rejecting 15% of good parts - false rejection
initial_analysis: Camera calibration or lighting degradation
disposition: System being recalibrated and lighting upgraded

title: Weld Spatter Excessive
creator: Sarah Lee
description: Excessive weld spatter requiring additional cleaning operations
initial_analysis: Welding parameters or shielding gas issue
cause_of_ncr: Welding wire feed speed too high
reason_closure: Welding parameters optimized. Spatter reduced to acceptable levels.

title: Crimp Pull Test Failure
creator: Jane Doe
description: Wire crimp failed pull test at 18 lbs vs minimum 25 lbs
initial_analysis: Crimping die wear or wrong die selection
disposition: All crimps from same tool being inspected. Die replacement scheduled.

title: Helium Leak Above Specification
creator: Tom Hardy
description: Leak rate at 5x10^-7 cc/sec vs maximum 1x10^-7 cc/sec
initial_analysis: Seal or weld defect

title: Statistical Sampling Plan Violation
creator: Robert Chen
description: Sampling plan requires 32 samples but only 20 were inspected
initial_analysis: Audit finding - procedure not followed
reason_closure: Additional samples inspected - all passed. Inspector retrained on sampling requirements.
